create-video-from-template.description: Create a video using a selected template.

props.name: callbackUrl
props.description: Webhook URL to notify when video rendering is complete.

retrieve-translated-video-status.description: Retrieves the status of a translated video.

props.name: videoId
props.description: The ID of the translated video to check the status for.

retrieve_video_status.description: Retrieve the status and details of a video using its ID.

props.name: videoId
props.description: The ID of the video to retrieve the status for.

retrieve_sharable_video_url.description: Generates a public URL for a video, allowing it to be shared and accessed publicly.

props.name: videoId
props.description: The ID of the video to generate a shareable URL for.

translate_video.description: Translate a video into 175+ languages with natural voice and lip-sync.

props.name: videoUrl
props.description: URL of the video file to be translated. Supports direct URLs, Google Drive, and YouTube.

props.name: title
props.description: Optional title of the translated video.

props.name: translateAudioOnly
props.description: Only translate the audio without modifying faces.

props.name: speakerNum
props.description: Number of speakers in the video (if applicable).

props.name: callbackId
props.description: Custom ID returned in webhook callback.

props.name: callbackUrl
props.description: URL to notify when translation is complete.

upload_asset.description: Upload media files (images, videos, or audio) to HeyGen. Supports JPEG, PNG, MP4, WEBM, and MPEG files.

props.name: file
props.description: The file to upload (JPEG, PNG, MP4, WEBM, or MPEG).

video_generation_completed.description: Triggers when a video is generated successfully.

video_generation_failed.description: Triggers when a video generation process fails.
